per_frame_1=//wave_a = 0;
per_frame_2=
per_frame_3=//decay = 0.1;
per_frame_4=
per_frame_5=
per_frame_6=tic = min(time-tin,.1);
per_frame_7=tin = time;
per_frame_8=
per_frame_9=ti = ti + tic*24;
per_frame_10=q1 = above(ti,1);
per_frame_11=ti = ti*below(ti,1);
per_frame_12=
per_frame_13=
per_frame_14=
per_frame_15=t2 = t2 + tic*bass*bass;
per_frame_16=t2 = t2*below(t2,.01);
per_frame_17=q5 = equal(t2,0);
per_frame_18=q5 = 1-tic*(.5 + .1*bass*bass);
per_frame_19=
per_frame_20=//t2 = 1-t2;
per_frame_21=//q5 = t2;
per_frame_22=
per_frame_23=
per_frame_24=vt = vt + bass*mid*treb*tic*.2;
per_frame_25=
per_frame_26=bt = bt + bass*tic*.4;
per_frame_27=mt = mt + mid*tic*.4;
per_frame_28=tt = tt + treb*tic*.4;
per_frame_29=q2=bt;
per_frame_30=q3=mt;
per_frame_31=q4=tt;
per_frame_32=
per_frame_33=q10 = vt;
per_frame_34=
per_frame_35=q11 = .5 + .25*sin(bt*1.12);
per_frame_36=q12 = .5 + .25*sin(bt*0.98);
per_frame_37=
per_frame_38=monitor = above(bass*mid*treb,int(rand(1001))*.001*2);
per_frame_39=
per_frame_40=q20=aspecty;
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`
warp_4=`
warp_5=`float error     = 2;        // maximum random pixel offset
warp_6=`float diffusion = 0.005;      // dither strength
warp_7=`float fadeout   = -0.002;    // may be minor 1/256 due to the error diffusion dither;
warp_8=`
warp_9=`float2 dither_uv = uv_orig*texsize.xy*texsize_noise_lq.zw*1.5 + rand_frame.xy;
warp_10=`float magic = lum(GetPixel(lerp(uv_orig,uv, 4))) - lum(GetBlur3(lerp(uv_orig,uv,0)));
warp_11=`uv = lerp(uv_orig,uv, magic*12 ) + (tex2D(sampler_noise_lq, dither_uv)-0.5)*texsize.zw*error;
warp_12=`ret = tex2D(sampler_pw_main,uv)+(tex2D(sampler_noise_lq, dither_uv)-0.5)*diffusion + fadeout;
warp_13=`
warp_14=`float4 noise2 = tex3D(sampler_noisevol_hq, 
warp_15=`                      ((uv.xyy+float3(lum(roam_sin.xy),
warp_16=`                                           lum(roam_cos.yx),
warp_17=`                                           0)*0.5
warp_18=`                       )*texsize.xyy*texsize_noisevol_hq.zww
warp_19=`                      ).xyz*
warp_20=`                      float3(1,1,0)*0.05 + 
warp_21=`                      time*float3(0,0,1)*0.2 
warp_22=`                     );
warp_23=`ret *= (noise2)*1; 
warp_24=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`float2 uvm = frac(uv + time*.0);
comp_4=`
comp_5=`ret = tex2D(sampler_main,uvm);
comp_6=`float diff = 1-length(ret.xy-GetBlur1(uvm).xy)*3.5;
comp_7=`diff *=1-length(ret.xy-GetBlur2(uvm).xy)*1;
comp_8=`ret.xy *= diff;
comp_9=`ret.z = 0;
comp_10=`
comp_11=`//ret = tex2D(sampler_main,uvm);
comp_12=`ret.x=treb*.9*roam_sin.y*.4-ret.x;
comp_13=`ret.y=mid *.9*roam_cos.y*.5-ret.y;
comp_14=`ret.z=bass*.9*roam_sin.x*.3-ret.z;
comp_15=`
comp_16=`}
